languages.text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.
languages.original_text: Создает токсичную область на 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 rounds and deals 8 Toxic damage to anyone who enters the area or start its round inside it.
Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 rounds and deals 8 toxic damage to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.
Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.
Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.

languages.text: Erzeugt 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang einen toxischen Bereich, der allen Kreaturen, die den Bereich betreten oder sich zu Beginn der Runde darin aufhalten, 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxischen Schaden{/g} zufügt.
languages.original_text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.

traits.locale_text: Erzeugt einen toxischen Bereich, der 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang anhält und jedem, der den Bereich betritt oder seine Runde darin beginnt, 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxischen Schaden{/g} zufügt.

languages.text: Crée une zone toxique qui dure 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} et inflige 8 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} à quiconque y entre ou y commence son round.
languages.original_text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.

traits.locale_text: Crée une zone toxique qui dure 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} et inflige 8 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} à quiconque entre dans la zone ou y commence son round.

languages.text: 制造一片有毒区域，持续四{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果有任何生物进入这片区域，或在这片区域内开始回合，则会受到8点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.

traits.locale_text: 制造一片有毒区域，持续四{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果有任何生物进入这片区域，或在这片区域内开始回合，则会受到8点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Crea una zona tóxica que dura 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} e inflige 8 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} a cualquiera que entre en el área o empiece su turno en ella.
languages.original_text: Creates a toxic area which lasts for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to anyone who enters the area or starts their round inside it.

languages.text: 4{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続し、エリア内に立ち入った相手、またはラウンド開始時にエリア内にいた相手に{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を8与える毒エリアを生成する。

languages.text: Создает токсичную область на 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Создает токсичную область на 4 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 8 токсичного урона.
Создает токсичную область на 4 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 8 токсичного урона.

languages.text: 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca kalan toksik bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren veya raunduna bu alan içinde başlayan herkes, 8 puan {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} alır.
